pullrequest.title: Get plugin info with Ignition transport service

content.raw:
Looking at the Jenkins raw output, it looks like the problem is when building a standalone program. I can't reproduce that locally. I tried explicitly including ign-msgs in this example, Jenkins [queued](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/).

~~~

content.html:
Looking at the Jenkins raw output, it looks like the problem is when building a standalone program. I can't reproduce that locally. I tried explicitly including ign-msgs in this example, Jenkins queued.

527: [ RUN      ] Standalone/ExamplesBuild_Standalone.Standalone/5
